Uses of Class
com.peyrona.mingle.cil.Command

    • Uses of Command in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.devices

      Subclasses of Command in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.devices 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Device
      A Device can be either a sensor or an actuator.

      After DEVICE is added to its controller and it has a bus to send messages to, we can init the DEVICE get.

      Devices can be dynamically added and removed: this is something that has to be done carefully: adding dynamically a device does not passes all the "controls" that are passed by the transpiler; e.g.: time units can not be used: time has to be expressed in milliseconds.

    • Uses of Command in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.drivers

      Subclasses of Command in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.drivers 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Driver
      A Driver is an intermediate between devices and Controllers.

    • Uses of Command in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.rules

      Subclasses of Command in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.rules 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Rule
      RULE commands provide the logic to the language.

    • Uses of Command in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.scripts

      Subclasses of Command in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.scripts 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Script
      Represents an script.
